titleStmt.title: Noah's flood, or, The destruction of the world an opera / by Edward Ecclestone ...
Noah's flood. Libretto
titleStmt.author: Ecclestone, Edward, fl. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Clark, and sold by B. Tooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Published also under titles: The cataclysm, or, General deluge of the world and The deluge, or, The destruction of the world.
"Dedicated to Her Grace the Duchess of Monmouth."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
